PosDefManifold Documentation

PosDefManifold Documentation

Installation

Overview

Code units

PosDefManifold includes five code units (.jl files):

UnitDescription
PosDefManifold.jlMain module
riemannianGeometry.jlThe fundamental unit collecting all Riemannian functions
linearAlgebra.jlCollection of linear algebra routines
signalProcessing.jlCollection of signal processing routines
test.jlUnit performing all tests
